Laser wavelength.description: The wavelength of the excitation laser

Laser power.description: The power level of the excitation laser (nominal)

Spot size.description: Laser spot diameter as determined by laser wavelength and microscope objective

Accumulation.description: The number of scan on each sample exposure

Integration time.description: The measure of how long the scattered light is exposed to the detector. Also known as exposure time

Resolution.description: the spectral resolution of a Raman spectrometer

Max range.description: The maximum spectral range of a Raman spectrum

Min range.description: The minimum spectral range of a Raman spectrum

Detector model.description: Model name of the CCD detector

Objective.description: Front optical element in a microscope that gathers or brings light from or to the object being observed
